topic.title: Initial selling proposition: PT04.01.01
topic.shortdesc: Initial selling proposition is the starting point of Project Implementation process. Salesperson create document that has the same title - Initial selling proposition and is created based on enterprise products that are described in Knowledge Base portal, Functional Tasks section.

body.p:
Step by step guidance to create Initial selling proposition document.
Find out with your client what Role handles the task and what Category the task is.
Go to Knowledge Base section Roles to review tasks that are assigned to this RoleWe recommend you to open the Role's task list in a new tab to comfortably switch between this guide and needed sections
Find within the task list the task title client is talking about
Select task title within the list and main Task page will be opened
Select Task handle UI page parameter to demonstrate how the front-end page may look like
Go back to Task's main page by using an arrow on the top left corner
Select Task's Step-by-step guidance page (UX logic)
Lead the client through the Task's UX logic
Use Task's PID to include it to the initial selling proposition If we have such tool (interoperability), the document line will be generated automatically.
Go to the next Task.
